Bottom Positions

Home » Bjj Positions » Bottom Positions

April 9, 2016 in Bjj Positions by admin

The Guard Position on the bottom is not really where you want to be. It’s advantageous to be on the top, of course. However, if you have to be on the bottom, it’s the best place to be, especially for submissions. The bottom position in the Guard offers a plethora of submission options.
A reversal from a dominant or top position is called a sweep, these are usually the aim of a fight in the bottom position, though there are some submissions that can be executed from the guard
